Tool

Class MemoryDistance

  • java.lang.Object
    • Tool.MemoryDistance

  • public class MemoryDistance
extends java.lang.Object
    MemoryDistance regroups the methods related to semantic distances. This class computes and saves the semantic distances between cities and clues. The saved distances are recorded in a file and eventually reopened.
    Author:
    kemoadrian

    • Method Detail

      • setN

        public static void setN(java.lang.Double N)
        Sets the maximum value for the number of hits that a query can have (usually a really common query). Only used for the distances based on wikipedia queries.
        Parameters:
        N - a Double to set as the maximum value

      • nbHints

        public static java.lang.Double nbHints(java.lang.String s)
        Number of hits for a String query in Wikipedia. If this query has already been tested, it is loaded from the memory file.
        Parameters:
        s - the String with the query
        Returns:
        the Double with the number of hits

      • distance

        public static java.lang.Double distance(java.lang.String country,
                                        java.lang.String clue)
        Gives the semantic distance between a country and a clue. The value will depend of the semantic distance selected as a static Integer of the class.
        Parameters:
        country - a String with the name of country
        clue - a String with the name of the clue
        Returns:
        a Double with the semantic distance between the country and the clue

      • saveDistances

        public static void saveDistances(java.lang.String file)
        Save the Wikipedia distances in a file.
        Parameters:
        file - the String with the path and name of the file

      • saveWNDistances

        public static void saveWNDistances(java.lang.String file)
        Save the wordnet distances in a file.
        Parameters:
        file - the String with the path and name of the file

      • loadDistances

        public static void loadDistances(java.lang.String file)
        Load the Wikipedia distances from a file.
        Parameters:
        file - the String with the path and name of the file
